name: ResetUserPassword
description:
Reset user's password and generate a one-time token link.

This tool resets a user's password, generating a one-time token (OTT) for a password reset. It transitions the user to 'RECOVERY' status, preventing sign-in until the reset is complete. An option to delete all user sessions is available, except in the current session's context. The tool can convert users to and from Okta credential providers. Can email the OTT or return it for custom distribution.

parameters.name: user_identifier
parameters.description: An ID, login, or unambiguous shortname of an existing Okta user for whom the password reset is initiated.

value_schema.description: An ID, login, or login shortname (as long as the shortname is unambiguous) of an existing Okta user

parameters.name: send_ott_email
parameters.description: Set to true to automatically email the one-time token link to the user for password reset.

parameters.name: revoke_all_sessions_except_current
parameters.description: If true, revokes all user sessions except the current one.

value_schema.description: Revokes all user sessions, except for the current session, if set to `true`

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the okta API.

parameters.name: revokeSessions
parameters.description: Revokes all user sessions, except for the current session, if set to `true`

value_schema.description: Revokes all user sessions, except for the current session, if set to `true`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: An ID, login, or login shortname (as long as the shortname is unambiguous) of an existing Okta user

value_schema.description: An ID, login, or login shortname (as long as the shortname is unambiguous) of an existing Okta user
